original_title: Best of Duck Dynasty: In the Blind
overview: Best of Duck Dynasty: In the Blind movie was released Dec 31, 2013 by the A&E Home Video studio. Includes the following episodes from the 1st season: Sauvignon Beard, Plan Bee, Daddy's Got A Gun, Fishin' For Business, Redneck Roadtrip, Winner, Winner Turkey Dinner, Willie Stay Or Willie Go.
